description:
One day, the sky island begins to fall.
The sacred stones that keep the heavens floating are scattered for unknown reasons.
To prevent falling the sky island, the main character goes out looking for the whereabouts of the sacred stone.
Giant animal and unknown creatures start to show up unexpectedly on the island.
Indeed, is it possible to protect the falling sky island during facing the giant monster?

Powerful and various bosses!
Animals that suddenly turn into monsters because of an unforeseen problem will block you.
Against animals and creatures that have become huge and powerful, you have to acquire sacred stones.
Various bosses will attack you in different patterns.
Hard-core bosses are waiting for you, such as flying projectile in unexpected directions, and high-speed movements. 
Analyze the boss's attack and effectively target them.

Retro-style dot graphic!
Dynamic moving giant boss and simple and unique background with beautiful retro-style dot graphic!

Special weapons with different performance!
There are various weapons that you can get from exploring maps.
Use the weapons of different performance in the proper way to attack the bosses.

Hidden item and boss!
Valuable resource and item are hidden somewhere in each chapter.
And there may be some unknown hidden beings.
Take a look closer at the terrain and acquire hidden elements.

Quick and cheerful action!
Supported smooth and natural control.
Jump and make use of the terrain to evade boss's attack.
